SELECT * FROM (SELECT p.*, TO_CHAR(p.perform_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') perform_date_format, m.operator, m.meetingname FROM performance p JOIN meeting m ON p.meetingno=m.meetingno WHERE perform_date > sysdate AND perform_date <= (sysdate+7) ORDER BY dbms_random.value) WHERE ROWNUM <= 6

SELECT * FROM (SELECT DISTINCT b.bbsno, m.meetingname, m.bannerImg, m.operator, SUBSTR(b.contents, 0,20) contents, TO_CHAR(b.bbspostdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') bbspostdate, like_c.like_count FROM bbs b JOIN meeting m ON b.id=m.operator JOIN bbs_img bi ON b.bbsno=bi.bbsno JOIN like_bbs lb ON b.bbsno=lb.bbsno JOIN (select bbsno, count(*) like_count from like_bbs group by bbsno having count(*) >= 0 ORDER BY like_count DESC) like_c ON like_c.bbsno = b.bbsno ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 6
SELECT img FROM bbs_img WHERE bbsno=#{bbsno} and ROWNUM=1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT DISTINCT b.bbsno,m.meetingno, m.meetingname, SUBSTR(b.contents, 0,20) contents, TO_CHAR(b.bbspostdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') bbspostdate, like_c.like_count FROM bbs b JOIN meeting m ON b.id=m.operator JOIN bbs_img bi ON b.bbsno=bi.bbsno JOIN like_bbs lb ON b.bbsno=lb.bbsno JOIN (select bbsno, count(*) like_count from like_bbs group by bbsno having count(*) >= 0 ORDER BY like_count DESC) like_c ON like_c.bbsno = b.bbsno ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 6
SELECT img FROM bbs_img WHERE bbsno=#{bbsno} and ROWNUM=1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.meetingname, m.bannerImg, m.meetingdescription, m.operator, m.meetingno, extract(year from FUNDINGENDDATE) fyear, TO_CHAR(fundingenddate,'Mon','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=ENGLISH') fmonth, extract(day from FUNDINGENDDATE) fday FROM funding f JOIN meeting m ON m.meetingno=f.meetingno WHERE f.enabled=1 AND m.enabled=1 ORDER BY dbms_random.value) WHERE ROWNUM <= 6
